titleStmt.title: The workes of that famous chirurgion Ambrose Parey translated out of Latine and compared with the French. by Th: Johnson
Works. English
titleStmt.author: Paré, Ambroise, 1510?-1590.
Johnson, Thomas, d. 1644.
Cecil, Thomas, fl. 1630, engraver.
Baker, George, 1540-1600.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Th: Cotes and R. Young,

notesStmt.note: The title page is engraved and signed: T. Cecill sculp.
With a dedication to Sir Edward Herbert. Variant: with a dedication to Edward Lord Herbert of Cherbury.
Book 29, "The apologie and treatise, containing the voyages made into divers places" is translated by George Baker.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
